name: Will There Bee Another?
description:
You are Bee, a girl that it's on an online date with Mel. The date is almost over, but Bee doesn't wanna end it... Can you find the correct words to delay this date a little more, or even get a second date?

In this girls love dating simulator there are a lot of different routes, so don't worry if you have to try again, just enjoy the story and have fun!

#LoveisLove

CONTROLS

Mouse - Click and select the options.

TEAM

Gabriel Dias - Code and Writing.  https://twitter.com/gabrieldevbr

ArcaeLix - Art.  https://twitter.com/arcaelix

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR PLAYING "Will There Bee Another?" !

Link to Ludum Dare 50 game.
